product_metadata.title: Term Insurance for Senior Citizens
product_metadata.target_audience: Individuals aged 60 to 70 (eligible up to 75 in some cases)

product_summary.objective: To provide financial security, debt repayment support, and post-retirement safety for senior citizens.
highlights: Life cover options up to whole life (99 years)

plan_variants.description: Coverage for a defined period (e.g., 10, 15, 20 years).
Premiums refunded if the insured survives the policy term.

core_benefits.description: Sum assured paid to the nominee on death. Can be lump sum, monthly income, or combination.
Optional riders for critical illness or medical costs.
Premiums deductible under 80C (up to ₹1.5L). Death benefit tax-free under 10(10D).

discounts: 16% Discount on 1st year premium (implied from cross-sells)

compliance_rules.disclaimer: Insurance is subject to terms and conditions. Please read the sales brochure and policy document carefully before purchase.
compliance_rules.fraud_warning: BEWARE of spurious phone calls and fraudulent offers. IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.
compliance_rules.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits are subject to provisions of Section 80C and Section 10(10D) of the Income Tax Act, 1961. Consult your tax advisor.

retrieval_chunks.text: Term insurance for senior citizens provides financial safety for families, covering debts and daily needs upon the insured's demise.
Available for individuals aged 60 and above, with options for whole life coverage up to age 99.
The Return of Premium (ROP) option refunds total premiums paid if the policyholder survives the term.
Optional riders like Critical Illness and Accidental Death Benefit allow enhanced protection for medical and accident risks.
Premiums are tax-deductible up to ₹1.5 lakh under Section 80C. Death benefits are typically tax-free under Section 10(10D).
Designed for seniors who want to leave a legacy, cover outstanding loans, or ensure spouse's financial independence.
